Class NextBusTimeRequest

java.lang.Object
  com.canabang.genietext.transit.model.processor.requests.TransitServiceRequest
      com.canabang.genietext.transit.model.processor.requests.NextBusTimeRequest
All Implemented Interfaces:
Request
public class NextBusTimeRequest
extends TransitServiceRequest

Transit service request specifying the user wants the very next set of times a bus arrives at a certain station.

Version:
1.00 2009-05-31 Initial submission.
Author:
rhaq

Constructor Detail

NextBusTimeRequest

public NextBusTimeRequest(int busNumber,
                          int station,
                          Calendar sentTime)
                   throws ParserConfigurationException,
                          SAXException,
                          IOException
Creates a request specifying the user wants the next set of times the specified bus comes to the specified station on the specified day.

Parameters:
busNumber - The bus the user wants the first time for.
station - The stop number associated with the bus.
sentTime - The scheduled date associated with the request.
Throws:
ParserConfigurationException - If there is any problem setting up the XML parser.
SAXException - If there are any problems parsing the XML file associated with the transit service.
IOException - If there is a problem accessing the resource file for the transit service.

NextBusTimeRequest

public NextBusTimeRequest(int busNumber,
                          int station,
                          Calendar sentTime,
                          int frequency)
                   throws ParserConfigurationException,
                          SAXException,
                          IOException
Creates a request specifying the user wants the next set of times the specified bus comes to the specified station on the specified day, and to return the specified amount of results.

Parameters:
busNumber - The bus the user wants the first time for.
station - The stop number associated with the bus.
sentTime - The scheduled date associated with the request.
frequency - The amount of results that user wants to return.
Throws:
ParserConfigurationException - If there is any problem setting up the XML parser.
SAXException - If there are any problems parsing the XML file associated with the transit service.
IOException - If there is a problem accessing the resource file for the transit service.
Method Detail

fixSchedule

private Set<TransitTime> fixSchedule(Set<TransitTime> goe)
Retrieves the correct schedule if we reached the end of the list of a certain schedule.

Parameters:
goe - Pointer to set to the correct schedule.
Returns:
The correct following schedule.
